data.actual_result: The new messages that get loaded in when closing keyboard start at a much larger size and resize back to normal.
data.expected_result: The messages that load in when closing keyboard appear normally.
data.short_description: Some old messages resize after exiting keyboard.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel with a bunch of messages in it. - Open up the keyboard. - Scroll up to see older message. - Double tap to exit the keyboard.
